CreateProxy(address).details: Emitted when a new media is created.

newMedia(address,string,string,bytes,uin.details: Create a new account for media. Each proxy has its own storage and saves      data related to NFTs.

params.applicationMetadata: string of constant metadata for the defailts of the account
params.saltNonce: uint256 of the salt number to create a proxy address
params.updatableMetadata: string of constant metadata for the defailts of the account

devdoc.title: MediaFactory - creates proxy contracts for media accounts.
